text: Wilbert Joseph Tauzin II (; born June 14, 1943) is an American lobbyist and politician. He was the President and CEO of PhRMA, a pharmaceutical company lobby group. Tauzin was also a member of the United States House of Representatives from 1980 to 2005, representing Louisiana's 3rd congressional district. excerpt published as == References == Category:1943 births Category:American lobbyists Category:United States representatives from Louisiana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Louisiana Category:Politicians from Louisiana Category:Living people Category:Members of the Louisiana State Legislature
title: Billy Tauzin
